title: HTTP/HTTPS Enumeration
summary: Traffic analysis for anomalous web requests; identified fuzzing & directory enumeration patterns.
what_i_did: Built reusable capture/display filters to isolate suspicious web traffic quickly.
Correlated PCAP findings with server logs to validate enumeration attempts.
Wrote a short runbook so future triage is repeatable.

title: 3D Level Blockout
summary: Greybox level with focus on sightlines, flow, and lighting anchors.
what_i_did: Iterated on blockout geometry to improve pacing and readability.
Established key vistas and choke points to frame encounters.
Tested simple lighting to encourage navigation.

title: Static Portfolio
summary: Lightweight, responsive, accessible template with shared CSS.
what_i_did: Unified visual language across pages via a single CSS theme.
Added responsive nav, cards, and accessible color contrast.
Kept JS minimal for portability and speed.
